metadata.description: Top blockchain and crypto development tools including clients, development frameworks, and infrastructure

properties.docker_tags_url: Docker Hub or registry tags URL

notes: All projects are open source with active GitHub repositories
Docker tags data collected from public registries
Includes execution clients, consensus clients, development tools, and infrastructure

blockchain_tools.name: Geth (go-ethereum)
blockchain_tools.description: Official Go implementation of the Ethereum protocol execution client.

blockchain_tools.name: Lighthouse
blockchain_tools.description: Ethereum consensus client implementation in Rust focused on security and performance.

blockchain_tools.name: Foundry
blockchain_tools.description: Fast, portable Ethereum development toolkit written in Rust.

blockchain_tools.name: Hardhat
blockchain_tools.description: Ethereum development environment for compiling, deploying, testing, and debugging smart contracts.
blockchain_tools.notes: No official Docker image - typically used as npm package

blockchain_tools.name: Nethermind
blockchain_tools.description: .NET Ethereum execution client for enterprise and institutional use.

blockchain_tools.name: Besu
blockchain_tools.description: Enterprise-grade Ethereum execution client supporting public and private networks.

blockchain_tools.name: Erigon
blockchain_tools.description: Ethereum execution client focused on performance and disk space efficiency.

blockchain_tools.name: Prysm
blockchain_tools.description: Go implementation of the Ethereum consensus protocol with focus on usability and security.

blockchain_tools.name: Teku
blockchain_tools.description: Enterprise-grade Ethereum consensus client written in Java.

blockchain_tools.name: Nimbus
blockchain_tools.description: Lightweight Ethereum consensus client optimized for resource-restricted devices.

blockchain_tools.name: Reth
blockchain_tools.description: Modular, contributor-friendly Ethereum execution client written in Rust.

blockchain_tools.name: Solana
blockchain_tools.description: Web-scale blockchain for fast, secure, scalable, decentralized apps and marketplaces.

blockchain_tools.name: Bitcoin Core
blockchain_tools.description: Reference implementation of the Bitcoin protocol.

blockchain_tools.name: Truffle Suite
blockchain_tools.description: Development environment, testing framework and asset pipeline for Ethereum.

blockchain_tools.name: Ganache
blockchain_tools.description: Personal Ethereum blockchain for development and testing.

blockchain_tools.name: Brownie
blockchain_tools.description: Python-based development and testing framework for Ethereum smart contracts.

blockchain_tools.name: OpenZeppelin Contracts
blockchain_tools.description: Library of modular, reusable, secure smart contracts for Ethereum.

blockchain_tools.name: Slither
blockchain_tools.description: Static analysis framework for Solidity smart contracts.

blockchain_tools.name: Mythril
blockchain_tools.description: Security analysis tool for Ethereum smart contracts.

blockchain_tools.name: Etherscan
blockchain_tools.description: Block explorer and analytics platform for Ethereum.

blockchain_tools.name: The Graph
blockchain_tools.description: Indexing protocol for querying blockchain data with GraphQL.

blockchain_tools.name: IPFS
blockchain_tools.description: Peer-to-peer hypermedia protocol for content-addressed, distributed file system.

blockchain_tools.name: Chainlink
blockchain_tools.description: Decentralized oracle network connecting smart contracts with real-world data.

blockchain_tools.name: Remix IDE
blockchain_tools.description: Browser-based IDE for Solidity smart contract development.

blockchain_tools.name: Ape Framework
blockchain_tools.description: Framework for testing and deploying smart contracts with Python.

blockchain_tools.name: Waffle
blockchain_tools.description: Most advanced framework for testing smart contracts.

blockchain_tools.name: Arbitrum
blockchain_tools.description: Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum using optimistic rollups.

blockchain_tools.name: Optimism
blockchain_tools.description: Ethereum Layer 2 scaling solution using optimistic rollups.

blockchain_tools.name: Polygon
blockchain_tools.description: Ethereum scaling and infrastructure development platform.

blockchain_tools.name: Base
blockchain_tools.description: Ethereum Layer 2 blockchain built on OP Stack for secure, low-cost transactions.

blockchain_tools.name: zkSync
blockchain_tools.description: Ethereum Layer 2 protocol using zero-knowledge rollups.

blockchain_tools.name: Starknet
blockchain_tools.description: Decentralized validity rollup (ZK-rollup) for Ethereum scalability.

blockchain_tools.name: Polkadot
blockchain_tools.description: Heterogeneous multi-chain protocol enabling cross-chain transfers and interoperability.

blockchain_tools.name: Cosmos SDK
blockchain_tools.description: Framework for building public blockchain applications.

blockchain_tools.name: Avalanche
blockchain_tools.description: Platform for launching decentralized applications and enterprise blockchain deployments.

blockchain_tools.name: Near Protocol
blockchain_tools.description: Sharded, proof-of-stake Layer 1 blockchain designed for usability and scalability.

blockchain_tools.name: Cardano
blockchain_tools.description: Proof-of-stake blockchain platform with peer-reviewed research.

blockchain_tools.name: Sui
blockchain_tools.description: Layer 1 blockchain with object-centric data model and Move programming language.

blockchain_tools.name: Aptos
blockchain_tools.description: Layer 1 blockchain using Move programming language with parallel execution engine.

blockchain_tools.name: Tendermint Core
blockchain_tools.description: Byzantine Fault Tolerant consensus engine and application interface.

blockchain_tools.name: Ethers.js
blockchain_tools.description: Complete Ethereum library and wallet implementation in JavaScript.

blockchain_tools.name: Web3.js
blockchain_tools.description: Ethereum JavaScript API for interacting with Ethereum nodes.

blockchain_tools.name: MetaMask Snaps
blockchain_tools.description: Plugin system for extending MetaMask wallet functionality - enables developers to add new features, protocols, and blockchain support.

blockchain_tools.name: Vyper
blockchain_tools.description: Pythonic smart contract language with security and auditability focus.

blockchain_tools.name: Solidity
blockchain_tools.description: Object-oriented programming language for writing smart contracts on Ethereum.

blockchain_tools.name: Infura
blockchain_tools.description: Ethereum and IPFS API suite providing instant access over HTTPS and WebSockets.

blockchain_tools.name: Alchemy
blockchain_tools.description: Blockchain development platform powering millions of users.

blockchain_tools.name: Moralis

blockchain_tools.name: Viem

blockchain_tools.name: Wagmi
